attributes.action: TAKE PATTENS LEAVING AS AN IDEAL OPPORTUNITY TO SHUT DOWN THE BBC.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, to be unable to identify what it is we want you to do for us.  We hope this is helpful.


The BBC is a money guzzling anachronism which is no longer fit for purpose, except as a cash cow to make already very rich people, much, much richer at the expense of people who are being royally screwed by having to fork out their hard earned cash under threat of criminalisation.  NOW would be an ideal time to just SWITCH IT OFF AND NOT SWITCH IT BACK ON UNTIL IT HAS BEEN BOUGHT BY A COMMERCIAL ENTITY, TOTALLY AND UTTERLY BARRED FROM EVER RECEIVING EVEN ONE SINGLE POUND OF TAXPAYER MONEY FOR ANYTHING, IN THE FUTURE - EVEN IN PAYMENT FOR A SERVICE PROVIDED.
